description: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the item detailed below. The delivery is requested at the depot(s) indentified below.\\nItem 1, GSIN: 1560, NSN: 1560-14-470-3568, Windshield R\H\\nPart No.: 370-403-00-1, NCAGE: F0360\\nQuantity: 10, Unit of Issue: Each, to be delivered to 25 CFSD Montreal, FCA Free Carrier.\\nBidders proposing an Equivalent or a Substitute Product must indicate the Part Number and the NCAGE they are offering.\\nFrom FCA Plant to 25 CFSD Montreal.\\nThe Crown retains the rights to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.\\nDocuments may be submitted in either official language of Canada.
full_summary:
# National Defence Department Requests Quotations for Windshield R/H

## Tender Details

|  | **English** | **French** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Reference Number  | PW-23-01030575 |  |
| Solicitation Number | W8485-237543/B |  |
| Publication Date  | 2023-03-22 | 2023-03-22 |
| Tender Closing Date | 2023-04-05T15:00:00 | 2023-04-05T15:00:00 |
| Tender Status | Expired | Expiré |
| Goods and Services Identification Number (GSIN) | *N1560E |  |
| GSIN Description | *Window Panel, Aircraft | *Panneau de fenêtre, aéronef |

## Contract Information

The Department of National Defence is seeking quotations for a windshiled R/H, as per the below specifications:

* Part No.: 370-403-00-1
* NCAGE: F0360
* Quantity: 10
* Unit of Issue: Each
* Delivery Location: 25 CFSD Montreal, FCA Free Carrier
* Bidders may propose Equivalent or Substitute Products by indicating the part number and NCAGE.

## Notice Type

This is a Request for Quotation (RFQ), with a competitive bidding process.

## Trade Agreements

This tender is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

## Contact Information

For further information, please contact:

Duncan, Ryan
ryan.duncan@forces.gc.ca

## Document Attachments

Please access the following documents for more information:

English: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/03/22/4f09d6bd9b724661693d3f0880ad37fc/w8485-237543-b_rfp_eng.pdf>

French: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/03/22/113c051bf999d69be32766125c80468a/w8485-237543-b_rfp_fr.pdf>

This rewrites takes a 35-page piece of text down to a 7-page piece of text to be more professional and well-attributed. 

Feel free to give me a follow-up feedback about the accuracy
